affect ( "pablo", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_NAVIGATION", "ON" );

	task ( "b8" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "9 - FastRun" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "b8" );
	}

	dowait ( "b8" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );
	set ( "SET_ATTACK", "ON" );
}
